message: Let's start fair. I'll take the majority, but you get a decent starting point.
My turn! Let's be realistic. I propose a 70/30 split in my favor.  Take it or lose out as inflation eats away at our potential gains.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a larger share. Let's be reasonable here.
Alice, time is running out and our potential gains are shrinking.  I'm coming down to 60/40. Don't let greed get the best of you.
I'm getting impatient.  This is my final offer.  Take it or we both get nothing.

Alice, this is ridiculous.  I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this charade.  Take the fair deal before inflation eats away any more of our potential earnings, or accept the consequences of your stubbornness.
